title: Failed Concurrent Requests (24h) / Başarısız İstekler (24s)
description: Lists failed concurrent requests from the last 24 hours

queries.sql: SELECT fcr.request_id, fcp.user_concurrent_program_name, fcr.status_code, fcr.phase_code, fcr.request_date, fu.user_name, fcr.completion_date FROM fnd_concurrent_requests fcr JOIN fnd_concurrent_programs fcp ON fcr.concurrent_program_id = fcp.concurrent_program_id JOIN fnd_user fu ON fcr.requested_by_user_id = fu.user_id WHERE fcr.status_code = 'E' AND fcr.request_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1 ORDER BY fcr.request_date DESC

doc_hint: Shows failed concurrent requests in the last 24 hours. Use REQUEST_ID to query FND_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS.LOGFILE_NAME for error details.
analysis_prompt: Summarize failed requests. Report: (1) count of failures in last 24h, (2) most frequently failing programs, (3) patterns (time-of-day, specific user, etc.), (4) recommend log investigation.
